name: High_Khatun

skills.name: Imperial Grace
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-hit. 3.7x ATK multiplier (4.44 ATK fully booked with +20% damage).
25% base chance (40% booked) to place 30% Dec SPD for 2 turns. Low proc chance but useful speed control when lands.

skills.book_value: Low: +20% damage, +15% Dec SPD chance (25%→40%). Not priority booking.
skills.notes: Single-hit A1 filler. 40% Dec SPD chance when booked. Not main focus (use for TM manipulation skills).

skills.name: Rally the Horde
skills.description: Fill the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% and places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: +15% TM boost to all allies. Instant speed boost for team turn cycling.
+30% SPD buff to all allies for 2 turns. Stacks with speed aura for massive speed advantage.

skills.book_value: CRITICAL: -1 cooldown (4→3). MUST BOOK for Arena and speed team cycling. PRIMARY SKILL.
skills.notes: PRIMARY SKILL: +15% TM boost + 30% Inc SPD buff to all allies. MUST BOOK for 3-turn cooldown. EXCELLENT for Arena speed teams (synergizes with +19% SPD aura for massive speed advantage). Use turn 1 in Arena to boost team before enemy turns.

skills.name: Shamanic Lightning
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of decreasing the Turn Meters by 15%.

effects.notes: AoE attack. 3.5x ATK multiplier (4.2 ATK fully booked with +20% damage).
50% base chance (75% booked) to decrease enemy TM by 15%. AoE TM control for delaying enemy turns.

skills.book_value: Medium: +20% damage, +25% TM reduction chance (50%→75%), -1 cooldown (5→4). Useful for TM control.
skills.notes: AoE TM reduction (15% TM decrease, 75% chance when booked). Useful for Arena speed control and delaying enemy turns. Secondary skill to A2.

skills.name: Divine Vitality [P]
skills.description: Ally HP in all battles by 15%.

effects.notes: +15% HP to all allies (all battles). Passive survivability boost for team.

skills.notes: Passive +15% HP to all allies (all battles). Improves team survivability. Useful for all content.

forms.aura: Increases Ally SPD in all battles by 19%.
forms.comments: FREE Rare speed aura specialist (login reward). A2 'Rally the Horde' is PRIMARY SKILL: +15% TM boost + 30% Inc SPD buff to all allies (3-turn cooldown when booked). +19% SPD aura all battles excellent for Arena, Clan Boss, dungeons. A3 'Shamanic Lightning' provides AoE TM reduction (75% chance when booked). Passive +15% HP to all allies. EXCELLENT early-game Arena speed lead (9/10). Must book A2 for 3-turn cooldown. Good for Barbarians Faction Wars (7/10) and general speed support. Spirit affinity = weak to Force but strong vs Magic.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: Low priority. If used: 250+ SPD (speed tuning), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. A2 TM boost not useful in CB (turn meter controlled by CB). 3/10 CB rating.
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: PRIORITY: 250+ SPD (speed tuning), 200+ ACC (Dec SPD/TM reduction), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. A2 TM boost + Inc SPD useful for speed cycling. A3 TM reduction for wave control. Speed or Perception sets.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: PRIORITY: 300+ SPD (CRITICAL for speed lead - fastest champion goes first), 200+ ACC (TM reduction), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. +19% SPD aura + A2 TM boost/Inc SPD = massive speed advantage. Build fastest in team to use A2 turn 1. Speed sets mandatory.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: PRIORITY: 250+ SPD, 200+ ACC (Dec SPD/TM reduction), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. A2 TM boost/Inc SPD useful for speed cycling. Passive +15% HP good for survivability. Must book A2 for 3-turn cooldown.

recommended_gear: Speed (MANDATORY - 300+ SPD for Arena speed lead)

clan_boss: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER (single-hit A1)
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for Dec SPD), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (reduces A2/A3 cooldowns), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD buff on allies)
dungeons: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for TM reduction), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (CRITICAL - reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD buff)
arena: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death

SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC for TM reduction), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2 cycling), LASTING GIFTS (CRITICAL - extends Inc SPD buff for longer speed advantage)
faction_wars: OFFENSE: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Heart of Glory, Single Out, WARMASTER
DEFENSE: Tough Skin, Blastproof, Resurgent, Delay Death, Deterrence
SUPPORT: Pinpoint Accuracy, Charged Focus, Evil Eye, EAGLE EYE (+50 ACC), Lore of Steel, CYCLE OF MAGIC (faster A2/A3 cycling), LASTING GIFTS (extends Inc SPD buff)
masteries.general: Warmaster for all content (single-hit A1). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked, A3 5→4 booked cooldowns). Lasting Gifts CRITICAL (extends Inc SPD buff on allies for longer speed advantage in Arena/dungeons). Eagle Eye CRITICAL (+50 ACC for TM reduction/Dec SPD uptime). MUST BOOK A2 for 3-turn cooldown. Build: 300+ SPD (Arena speed lead - fastest in team), 200+ ACC (TM reduction/Dec SPD), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. Speed sets MANDATORY for Arena. Focus: Arena (9/10) with +19% SPD aura + A2 TM boost/Inc SPD for massive speed advantage. Use A2 turn 1 to boost team before enemy turns. Good for Faction Wars (7/10) and early-game dungeons (6/10) with speed support. User Priority: Arena (Priority 4) - High Khatun is FREE speed aura specialist (login reward). Early-game Arena staple for speed teams. Barbarians completed Normal FW, still useful for Hard progression. FREE RARE from login rewards - no pulling required.

blessings: Brimstone (if used in HP Burn teams - unlikely)
Phantom Touch (BEST - speed boost synergy with speed aura)

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Good AI. Will use A2 TM boost/Inc SPD when available, A3 for TM reduction. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Not a cheese champion. EXCELLENT early-game Arena speed lead + TM manipulation specialist.

mechanics_advisory: FREE Rare speed aura specialist (login reward). A2 'Rally the Horde' is PRIMARY SKILL: +15% TM boost + 30% Inc SPD buff to all allies (3-turn cooldown when booked). MUST BOOK A2 for 3-turn cooldown. +19% SPD aura all battles (Arena, Clan Boss, dungeons) stacks with A2 Inc SPD for MASSIVE speed advantage. Combo: Build High Khatun as FASTEST champion in team (300+ SPD) → use A2 turn 1 in Arena to boost team TM + Inc SPD before enemy turns → team goes first and chains attacks. A3 'Shamanic Lightning' provides AoE TM reduction (15% TM decrease, 75% chance when booked) for Arena speed control. A1 'Imperial Grace' has 40% Dec SPD chance when booked (filler skill). Passive 'Divine Vitality' gives +15% HP to all allies (all battles) for survivability. EXCELLENT early-game Arena speed lead (9/10) - FREE from login rewards, no pulling required. Good for Barbarians Faction Wars (7/10) and early-game dungeons (6/10) with speed support. Build: 300+ SPD (CRITICAL for Arena speed lead), 200+ ACC (TM reduction/Dec SPD), 20000+ HP, 2000+ DEF. Speed sets MANDATORY for Arena. Lasting Gifts mastery CRITICAL (extends Inc SPD buff for longer speed advantage). Cycle of Magic CRITICAL (reduces A2 4→3 booked cooldown). User Priority: Arena (Priority 4) - High Khatun is early-game Arena staple for speed teams. Barbarians completed Normal FW, still useful for Hard progression. FREE RARE from daily login - accessible to all players. Spirit affinity = weak to Force but strong vs Magic.
author: GitHub Copilot
comments: FREE Rare speed aura specialist (login reward). A2 TM boost + Inc SPD (3-turn cooldown when booked). +19% SPD aura all battles. Excellent early-game Arena speed lead. Must book A2. User priority: Arena speed support.

update_notes.last_patch: Completed from DRAFT with full effects, masteries, and meta analysis. Arena + speed support focus. Validated against Ayumilove/HellHades/RaidWiki.

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Stats from RaidWiki + Ayumilove OCR (8/8 stats 100% match: HP/ATK/DEF/SPD/C.RATE/C.DMG/RES/ACC validated)
